summary: The January 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol highlights the critical need to identify and address weaknesses in the management and security functions of the Capitol Police. We testified on the importance of addressing auditing entities' recommendations to better oversee and manage the force. Our previous work looked at the Capitol Police Board's main governing document. Our February 2017 recommendation to revise the Board's Manual...
title: Capitol Police: Applying Effective Practices to Address Recommendations Will Improve Oversight and Management
